EmailTemplate.description: 1st Follow-up - Launched without Approval - Panda Doc
EmailTemplate.name: 1st Follow-up - Launched without Approval - Panda Doc
EmailTemplate.subject: Following Up: IDX Agreement Incomplete
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
I hope you are having a great day! I'm following up with our previous email, have you had a chance to complete the requested data access agreement?
Please note if we do not receive a signed data access agreement we will need to hide the home search tool on your site.
Let me know if you have any questions or need anything from me. I'm here to help!
Regards,
